home_description: Innovation and development of Scalable Systems to take your ideas to the next level.
about_bio: Specialized in application development, with a solid foundation in systems and database development. Passionate about creating innovative solutions and contributing to impactful projects.
about_me_text: I am a highly motivated and skilled systems engineer with a proven track record in full-stack development. My experience spans various technologies, including frontend frameworks like React and Angular, backend languages like Python and Java, and database systems like MySQL and PostgreSQL. I am adept at designing, developing, and deploying scalable and efficient web applications. My academic projects have provided me with hands-on experience in real-world scenarios, enabling me to hone my problem-solving skills and collaborate effectively within teams.
achievements_subtitle: A selection of my most recent and significant achievements.
tech_subtitle: A showcase of the main technologies I have experience with, used in academic and personal projects, in both frontend and backend development and databases.
achievements_comp_desc: Outstanding participation in innovative technological solutions, prototype development, and software strategies applicable to real-world scenarios.
achievements_hack_desc: Backend development of a Java application integrated with a cloud database on Azure, applying best practices for scalable development.
